[丑]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – a hand with emphasizing claws or fingernails.
Phonetically borrowed to represent an earthly branch. It also started meaning "ugly" as a simplified form of an unrelated character with same pronunciation, 醜 .

[醜]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *l̥ʰjuʔ ): phonetic 酉 ( OC *luʔ ) + semantic 鬼 ( “ ghost, demon ” ) - demons are ugly in Chinese culture.
